Review.Titre: No option to cancel subscriptions
Review.Contenu: No option to cancel subscriptions. You are supposed to email them and ask them to cancel it for you. Which I did, I received a response from their "support" telling me they canceled my subscription along with a paragraph talking about how they don't let you cancel yourself because security or whatever. Still getting charged.

Review.Titre: E6B arrived totally inoperative!
Review.Contenu: When my Sporty’s E6B computer arrived, I put new batteries in it, checking for the correct polarity placement per the instructions, and upon depressing the on/off button, I promptly saw on its screen…NOTHING AT ALL!So I removed the batteries and placed them in another appliance, with which they worked just fine.  I carefully replaced the batteries once more, and again depressed the on/off button, still with no result.Now, of course, I will be required to send it back to you (paying its postage a second time!) and wait for you to either repair or replace it.I am NOT a satisfied customer…

Review.Titre: I wish I could give it no stars
Review.Contenu: I wish I could give it no stars. I purchased  this produce 12/10/22 hoping to get it for Xmas. It’s already 2//4/23 and I have yet received updates regarding updates. They keep telling me it’s back order until  Jan 31/23 now then I call back and it’s back order from 2/17/23. No email no communication. I’ve had to call customer service myself to ask the questions. This is the last time I’m ever ordering anything from this place again! Communication is terrible with this company. You have to do all the calling if you want answers. If now they will not reach out to you!

Review.Titre: Ordered a PJ2 radio and right on the…
Review.Contenu: Ordered a PJ2 radio and right on the order page I indicated I did not want it delivered until Monday. Today is Saturday and it was just delivered. If you’re going to have the option to “buy now, deliver later” on your order form, perhaps you should pay attention to that!

Review.Titre: Do not order the ForeFlight Sentry from…
Review.Contenu: Do not order the ForeFlight Sentry from them! I’m bought one from them almost 5 months ago and the only thing I get is the run around on the phone and a email saying it’s gonna be basically another month.

Review.Titre: My order seems to have become a mess...
Review.Contenu: My order seems to have become a mess...- ordered 2 CO detectors but they only had one- same order had low profile wheel chocks- same order had embroidered shirt, gift wrapped, and personal note.What I received: - 1 CO detector... as I expected - wheel chocks shown as shipped and received with CO detector.... did not receive! - received personal note and message that shirt is back ordered. OK...What happened to the chocks?

Review.Titre: Folks at Sporty’s don’t think
Review.Contenu: Folks at Sporty’s don’t think.  I bought an outdated sectional chart for study purposes.  Prod was fair at $9.00, but then they charged me $5.95 for Mailing it to me.  $1.55 postage was all they paid.  Nothing wrong with making a profit, but not fair to gouge your customer.

Review.Titre: ORDERED A REDBIRD SIM WEBSITE CLAIMED…
Review.Contenu: ORDERED A REDBIRD SIM WEBSITE CLAIMED ITEM IN STOCK SHIPS SAME DAY. SURPRISE SURPRISE NEXT DAY I CALLED THERE IS NO ITEM THERE WAS NO SHIPMENT. IRS BACK ORDERED 6-8 WEEKS. THANKS FOR NOTHING OTHER THAN WASTING MY TIME.

Review.Titre: I have gotten like 10 emails for 1…
Review.Contenu: I have gotten like 10 emails for 1 purchase. There should be 2; one for the order and one for when the order gets shipped. Stop blowing up my mailbox with unnecessary emails.

Review.Titre: Shipment
Review.Contenu: After i bought the headset, the delivery time auddenly changed from 30 to 40 business days and also the free shipment changed into $35

Review.Titre: Insane shipping fees
Review.Contenu: Not sure why I had to pay $10 shipping for a $12 poster. However I needed the instructional aide to help my students.

Review.Titre: The radio sucks it does not have a scan…
Review.Contenu: The radio sucks it does not have a scan feature i paid nearly 300.00 for that? WHAT BULLS you guys are selling cheap sh radios for alot of money . F off

Review.Titre: Ordered yesterday morning and still…
Review.Contenu: Ordered yesterday morning and still don't have it available in my Sporty's downloads.  Might like it if I ever get it.

Review.Titre: Appalling!!!
Review.Contenu: Appalling!!!!  1)  My account has several gift-cards so I try to pay using gift cards, oldest first, smallest $$ first. When doing so, online system accepts all data but does NOT provide any button to complete order.  Customer Service advises only, "clear cookies and cache and try again" - did so and doesn't work!  Has happened to me three times in two months.2) Online process to debit partial $$ from gift-cards doesn't work - I have two gift cards whose $$ remaining after debit is higher than their ORIGINAL $$ value; two others where I know they have partial $$ remaining but online system claims value zero.3) Customer Service response to my phone complaint was stereotype; no matter how I complained, response was "Clear cookies and cache and try again".  When I stated that competitors provide FAR better customer service, I was invited to buy from competitor!  Customer Service doesn't appear to care about Sporty's reputation among my pilot community.4.  I have found that MyPilotStore has equally good product-line at lower cost, lower shipping costs, no online-system malfunctions, and VERY responsive Customer Service; in short, FAR better than Sporty's!My only reason to buy from Sporty's is $700+ of gift-card $$ locked into Sporty's online system.  I wish Sporty's would wake up to the fact that this company's attitude to customers and online-system reliability is rapidly undermining its historical position at top of pilot-supply online-order competitive environment.

Review.Titre: Another website offered free shipping
Review.Contenu: Found the same purchased item on another website that offered free shipping.

Review.Titre: Still waiting for my "immediate access"…
Review.Contenu: Still waiting for my "immediate access" course.  It's been over 24 hours!!

Review.Titre: I cancelled this order within 30…
Review.Contenu: I cancelled this order within 30 minutes of placing it and you shipped it anyway.

Review.Titre: Web Site issues continue
Review.Contenu: Web Site order was hung up for a week.  I was told it was my PC, then it was my browser, to log out and back in.  Nothing worked.  Let it sit for more than a week and then suddenly it worked!  Same PC, Same Browser.  This is a continuing Sporty's web site issue

Review.Titre: I tried updating my chat subscriptions…
Review.Contenu: I tried updating my chat subscriptions with additional charts. Still unclear if it updated.

Review.Titre: I paid for next day shipping and did…
Review.Contenu: I paid for next day shipping and did not receive it it for 4 days.

Review.Titre: I ordered an item from your website in…
Review.Contenu: I ordered an item from your website in a price of 13$, and it mentioned no shipping fee for regular international shipment. Then you sent me an email that I need to pay 17$ shipment.Because I saw in Oshkosh than no shipment fee I did not buy it in Oshkosh. Finally I canceled the order.I think you should send the item without shipment fee. That it is what I accept from a company like yours.

Review.Titre: Shipping/Processing
Review.Contenu: If you charge a customer for shipping on all of your products, the process should be more streamline. I ordered two days ago, and the order still hasn't even been fulfilled. Once fulfilled (who know how long that will take), I'll have to wait the standard shipping of 5-10 business days. You should at least offer free shipping to customers over a specific dollar amount as most businesses offer.

Review.Titre: Delivery date
Review.Contenu: I made this purchase as a gift.  I was pleasantly surprised to see a field on the website where you can enter the date you want the gift delivered.  I also made a comment in the comment section for the date to deliver the gift. Both failed. The gift wasn’t delivered as requested (missed it by 15 days).

Review.Titre: Didn't ship on time
Review.Contenu: I paid for expedited shipping and since the item was listed as in stock with a promised delivery date 2 days before my next work trip, I expected it to be on time.  The promised delivery date has come and gone and no tracking number was generated and the order page still shows the status as "processed".  I only ordered from sportys because they said it was in stock, and I paid extra for shipping because I needed the cable immediately.  Very disappointed since I had other retail options and chose sportys due to reputation and purported immediate availability.

Review.Titre: useless CFI course
Review.Contenu: After calling to express disappointment with the CFI lessons plan course explaining it was not made clear the lesson plans were ONLY for the sporty's course students AND would be USELESS in any other situation, the overly rude agent who continued to speak over me simply said "Well I guess you just bought something you don't need"and "We don't give refunds on apps"  firstly, I never asked for a refund. Secondly, one would think a business wouldn't want to lose the business of a repeat customer of hundreds of dollars over poorly worded $20 item.

Review.Titre: The photo of this product shows a…
Review.Contenu: The photo of this product shows a coiled cord. There is also a q&a where the staff said the cord was 3ft long.  This would lead me to believe the cable is longer than 6 inches. It's 6 inches- which is awful for a magnetic connection. You literally have to hold it while it charges. Sportys isn't responsible for the poor design, obviously, but it's not represented properly here. The implied length was the entire reason for my purchase.

Review.Titre: Shipping
Review.Contenu: I paid for the two days shipping and am being told that I won't receive the package for a total of 7 business days. This is not Sporty's fault this is solely Fedex. However, Sporty's should seriously consider discontinuing their contract with FedEx.

Review.Titre: False advertisement
Review.Contenu: False advertisement. Sporty’s says item in stock, placed the order and it says delivery within 3 days. Paid for the item, did not receive any mails on the shipping, called Sporty’s and they tell me is a six week delivery. You need to be up front in your page and not rely on the manufacturer’s page. It’s disappointing that you say one thing and then expect your customers to check on the manufacturers page to find out the late delivery, jus simply say up front that it will take up to six week delivery rather than saying is in stock

Review.Titre: I ordered my Bose a20 refresher kit
Review.Contenu: I ordered my Bose a20 refresher kit. They were in stock and said they would ship out the same day. I got an email today saying they won’t ship out until the august 18th which is over 3 weeks from when I bought them.

Review.Titre: I paid to have my package delivered on…
Review.Contenu: I paid to have my package delivered on Saturday for a flight I entered my address correctly and the receipt was correct however the packing slip had a different address so the fedex delivery wasn't made.

Review.Titre: making a single order from a website
Review.Contenu: making a single order from a website, without even receiving the product, is an extremely ridiculous thing to rate.  Do you want an opinion on whether your website works?  If it didn't work, then you would probably go out of business.  Asking for this review is stupid.

Review.Titre: I purchased the "Sporty’s Drone Study…
Review.Contenu: I purchased the "Sporty’s Drone Study Buddy - Remote Pilot Test Prep (Online, iOS, and Android)" application, the order shows that it has been processed, however I have yet to receive any links or instructions to download the application. My money was immediately processed, why in this day of instant processing should it take more then a few minutes for this type of transaction to complete?I am very disappointed...

Review.Titre: Still waiting for shipment
Review.Contenu: I ordered sectional charts 10 days ago and still have not received a tracking number nor notice of shipment.  However, I receive advertisements every other day.  Sporty’s might want to fulfill my original order before asking me to buy something else.

Review.Titre: Your check out process is terrible
Review.Contenu: Your check out process is terrible. It kept duplicating the items in the cart and then it would lose them entirely when I try to finalize the charge and say "there are no items in your cart". And also a side note, no promo codes available and having to pay full freight charges is not very competitive with other companies. There is a reason why I limit my purchases at sporty's. Learning to fly is expensive and you could offer a little more value on your site.

Review.Titre: shipping charges.
Review.Contenu: Reduce the shipping charges.

Review.Titre: Terrible workmanship
Review.Contenu: I am very disappointed with the product.  It looks like a child painted it and there is an obvious flaw on the one wing.  They made no attempt to even clean up the horrible paint job.  I cannot give it as a gift.  I have sent pictures to clearly show the terrible workmanship and have not received any response.

Review.Titre: Ordered before deadline of 5 PM Eastern…
Review.Contenu: Ordered before deadline of 5 PM Eastern and paid a premium for next day delivery, but indicates it(product) will only be delivered in 5 days even though product is in stock..Not the first time this has happened to me from Sporty's..I said never again, but here we are....I guess I have a short memory...

Review.Titre: The Sporty's web-site is terrible
Review.Contenu: The Sporty's web-site is terrible. This is the second time I've tried to order for a kid who is interested in learning to fly and the second time the order got screwed up. I need a receipt and I need shipping confirmation.

Review.Titre: Very difficult to get initial user set…
Review.Contenu: Very difficult to get initial user set and password set up.  Password reset process should not include a 20 to 30 minute delay.Message and access to support is not clearly ONLY during classic business hours.  This should be more up front.Personally do not like the menu expansions cover the detail of the screen each time the cursor crosses the main menu.

Review.Titre: I placed my ordered and paid an extra…
Review.Contenu: I placed my ordered and paid an extra $30 for overnight shipping. 3 days later no order. Called and was told it was on back order until 10/7. Cancelled my order on 10/1 at 8pm EST only to receive one email saying I would be contacted the next day and an hour later saying it had shipped. Have not received my order, a follow up email, or a cancel confirmation so I am not sure what the status is other than this place is shady.

Review.Titre: I ordered this Rusty Pilot kit which…
Review.Contenu: I ordered this Rusty Pilot kit which was supposed to have some on-line videos etc and when I signed up to be a Sporty's Pilot member I was promised no shipping on my first order. Well, I haven't received the video links and when I checked out I was charged shipping. So, what do I think of the Sporty's experience? iT STINKS!!!!!

Review.Titre: Items were due in on the 18th
Review.Contenu: Items were due in on the 18th. Missed the sweater party. We shall see if the rest makes it by Christmas. Be transparent if there could be a problem with delivery. If you say it will be here, I trust that. Give me the chance for a work around so I’m not in limbo. Gross lack of communication as well.

Review.Titre: Charged Shipping with Free Shipping Code accepted.
Review.Contenu: Signed up for a new account with Sporty's. Also signed up for Free Shipping on my first order. Placed my first order and was still charged shipping even though the code was accepted and shows at checkout under shipping. Not a good first experience.

Review.Titre: Careless Customer Service
Review.Contenu: Was excited about receiving my new Bose A20 headset with Bluetooth today... only to open the box to a non Bluetooth A20. What an easily avoidable and careless mistake to make. Now I get to spend time out of my day to ship this one back and wait some more for the headset I actually ordered. I personally cannot stand poor customer service.

Review.Titre: Customer Service and Ordering with Sporty’s
Review.Contenu: For my order I spoke to 3 people working here.   All I can say is I wish all businesses / customer service treated customers like Sporty’s.   100% will be a repeat customer just based on how I was treated.    All questions answered and explained in detail to help pick the items that would fit my needs.

Review.Titre: Poor Customer Service - Carlessness
Review.Contenu: I had several items shipped to the wrong address from separate orders even though my address was updated on my Sporty's account. Your customer service representatives did not seem very helpful and did not care at all about the mistake they had made several times in a row and there was no attempt to help me find a solution. Several shipments took weeks to deliver and one shipment in particular took over two months to deliver. I ordered a sectional chart that took so long to get delivered that it was practically expired by the time it got to me.

Review.Titre: I have placed several orders from…
Review.Contenu: I have placed several orders from sportys and you always charge me for shipping and this is very poor customer service quality. You should take care of your customers . I am also an AOPA member so I should get some discount . I am very unhappy with all my purchases at sportys.com

Review.Titre: Order Tracking Not Provided!
Review.Contenu: I placed an order online. When I went to track it (was over $1,000), this is what I got: Tracking information is currently not available. Please contact us for more information or email us at support@. I contacted Sporty's via Chat, the individual would only give me "estimated" delivery, no detail, no offer to pursue, nothing... Today, I checked again, same message. Went to UPS & plugged in the tracking number & again, no details, doesn't show location in transit, milestone progress, etc.. I would expect a higher level of service in today's world.

Review.Titre: Your site is terrible it did not show…
Review.Contenu: Your site is terrible it did not show items out of stock you let me think I was getting something and then when it ships tell me it’s on back order and you don’t know when you’re going to get it I will not waste my time using your company anymore I will buy my pilot supplies somewhere else

Review.Titre: Order not received
Review.Contenu: I placed my order on May 16th and have yet to receive the merchandise as of today, May 25th. This was intended to be given as a birthday gift. Tracking states the delivery should have occurred last Friday.

Review.Titre: The website was out of date
Review.Contenu: The website was out of date; it let me choose and pay for Canadian paper charts that Sporty's apparently has chosen to no longer carry.  A total waste of my time.

Review.Titre: I ordered the “small” Fire…
Review.Contenu: I ordered the “small” Fire Extinguisher, when it arrived I discovered you would need a 747 to carry this thing. I needed to return it, P.O. will not send because it’s considered hazardous material. Had to ship with private vendor who charged me $40.00. Tried to call Sporty’s twice and got same answer, basically buyer beware. Just because it’s the smallest fire Ext they sell, they say I should scroll down and read the measurements, which I’ll say is fair enough, EXCEPT I’m buying a product from Sporty’s who specifically sells to small GA aircraft and I would logically assume a small size would be appropriate for a small GA aircraft. DO NOT ORDER THIS THING! It would literally take up a seat to carry it.What a wasteful expense.Condescending attitude from Sporty’s just to make it a little more special.

Review.Titre: I will never buy from them again
Review.Contenu: I will never buy from them again. I received a double order and was charged twice for the order. When talked to customer service they admitted the mistake but refused to pay for the return shipping of the double order! Never again will I buy from sporty’s

Review.Titre: I have found it very difficult to…
Review.Contenu: I have found it very difficult to interact with the electronic order system.  First, it didn't accept my order, then it did accept my order, but did not apply my gift card.  This is not acceptable, and I have always had great service in the past.

Review.Titre: Mix up on the number of packages
Review.Contenu: Mix up on the number of packages, items receipt and tracking numbers.  The customer service person helping me kept asking for information that was irrelevant to the issue. I've bought a lot of stuff from you guys and this was a low point in terms of CS

Review.Titre: Your website said this item was in…

Review.Titre: Too slow, too disorganized
Review.Contenu: The site is very slow taking too long to make a simple order.Similar items, e.g, charts and supplements, are not group together so you need to hunt through the pages to find what you want.OOS on popular charts ,e.g., New York, Washington.

Review.Contenu: Website was exteremely difficult to use during the checkout phase. The website wouldn't load during the review and payments screen - i tried multiple browsers (Chrome and IE) as well as multiple computers. It finally worked through my iphone.

Review.Titre: I placed an order for a radio on…
Review.Contenu: I placed an order for a radio on January 16th and although I received an immediate "out of stock" message I've heard nothing since, and without any email confirmation of order I can't track status, either.

Review.Contenu: If I knew I would have to wait a whole day to get the product key, I would have just ordered from regular xplane site. The point of a digital copy is to have it INSTANTLY....not wait. Implement an AutoKey Gen on your site

Review.Titre: I purchased the Flight Review course…

My intent after reading your ad, was to purchase and imediately take and finish the course. My Sporty's account reflects the the purchase is 'processing.'Imediate procuct delivery after imediate payment mean 'imediate product delivery.' Very disapointed with my first Sporty's purchase...

Review.Titre: We are very disappointed by this…
Review.Contenu: We are very disappointed by this Sporty's site, terrible ordeal for us.From our experience theres no way to know if the items you want to order are in stock or not. We have orderd like we always do from other sites, but here in sporty's they bothered to let us know many days later that some of the products they advertise are not even in stock, and are expected to be available almost 2 MONTHS later. They also were late to let us know of the high shipping costs they charge. Costumer serive doesnt even answer to our complaints and dissatisfaction, they keep sending what seems like a general scripted messeges, doesnt feel they even read our complaints.Not ordering there agien.

Review.Titre: I order a digital download  AFTER I…
Review.Contenu: I order a digital download  AFTER I ordered and paid for it, then you tell me you'll email a key on the next business day!  If i wanted it tomorrow I would have purchased elsewhere ... and had the key within minutes.

Review.Titre: I have been trying for 5 days to…
Review.Contenu: I have been trying for 5 days to purchase online courses (Flight Review and Foreflight) via credit card or PayPal and the website will not complete the transaction.  Calling the phone order line tomorrow.

Review.Titre: Customer service inadequate.
Review.Contenu: Customer service inadequate.Your customer service members were unable to answer my questions about ordering online as a gift for Christmas, Also web site broken for reset password. VERY FRUSTRATING. Impossible to login and buy a gift for another person. You could mark something as a gift, but no where did it ask for name and address of gift receiver for online classes. I was dumbstruck by the lack of info anyone on the other end of the phone could answer. Still have no idea when the "gift notification" will mail, and I can only guess it will come to me instead of the intended person since the web site NEVER ASKED who the gift was for. simply awful. It's almost 2022, update your website please.

Review.Titre: I purchased the Flight Review course
Review.Contenu: I purchased the Flight Review course, but the Flight Simulator course was added to my list of courses. I have no use for the Simulator course but need the Review course NOW.

Review.Titre: Dear Sporty's team,

Review.Contenu: Please confirm your account to post your review	10/27/2020Horrendous customer service!  I ordered an A20 headset from this company with a free bose speaker as a promotion. This company clearly does NOT stand by what they advertise.

Review.Titre: STOP sending out stupid survey…

Review.Titre: I needed the order shipped to an…

Review.Titre: Horrible company
Review.Contenu: I had placed an order earlier this summer. I was then notified that the item was out of stock.I was under the impression the item was cancelled. several months later I received an email stating the item would ship on 10/29/21. On 10/19 I contacted your company to make sure I would not be receiving this item as I no longer wanted it. I was then told it was too late the item had already shipped. I had no notification that the item had shipped until after I contacted your customer service. The rep Lisa was rude basically telling me that it was my fault had I contacted you guys earlier in the day that they could have caught it. She stated I was on my own for the shipping back to the company which cost me an additional $40.00. I would NEVER recommend your company to anyone! In fact I think I'll post on YELP about my horrible experience.

Review.Titre: No communication
Review.Contenu: Ordered something on 12/26 with one-day shipping; should have arrived on 12/28. Never got the item and never got an email explaining the delay. (Today is 1/2.)

Review.Titre: the reviews are dumb
Review.Contenu: the reviews are dumb. They answer the question "Why did you choose this?" before the item arrives and can be evaluated. Sportys, post something relevant!

Review.Titre: Instructions tell me to copy plug-in…
Review.Contenu: Instructions tell me to copy plug-in and overwrite the others. I don’t believe this is correct.  And I deleted this sports plugin instead.

Review.Titre: I think your shipping is way over…
Review.Contenu: I think your shipping is way over priced. I bought a $26 product and it cost me over $10 to just get it shipped, I will look other places for a better shipping price,

Review.Titre: How do I open the thing?
Review.Contenu: How do I open the thing?I ordered a online course and still haven't found a way to open and use the $300 product.

Review.Titre: Found out my Flight Crew membership is…
Review.Contenu: Found out my Flight Crew membership is basically  worthless now that it does NOT include free 2 day shipping.  Cancelling Flight Crew Membership.

Review.Titre: Cumbersome checkout which refused my…
Review.Contenu: Cumbersome checkout which refused my subscription orders, then the person on the phone order line was unfamiliar with products and charges.

Review.Titre: Pilot Ship Membership No Longer Exists
Review.Contenu: I had placed my order, and their site offered me my usual free 2nd day air shipping I always get for being a club member. I received a call the day before the order was supposed to arrive, telling me the club membership no longer exists. Instead, the membership is now $50 a MONTH but I get free access to all of Sporty's training. I don't want or need that, I've tried Sporty's training and found it lacking. Sorry, taking my business elsewhere. The free 2nd day air shipping with my club membership was the main reason I use Sporty's.It won't let me reply to Sporty's reply, so I'll do it here. If Sporty's still offers the Ship Club, maybe your people need to know that. It was not mentioned, nor offered, my only option was the $50/month plan or pay for standard shipping. The person who called me didn't even offer to reinstate the Ship Club when I cancelled the order. I've already ordered elsewhere.

Review.Titre: Great company that I’ve used for…
Review.Contenu: Great company that I’ve used for decades, just hate all the marketing “spam” I constantly receive now that I’ve made an order.

Review.Titre: I was offered free shipping if I signed…
Review.Contenu: I was offered free shipping if I signed up to received emails and texts but when I got to checkout, it was not applied.

Review.Titre: Where is my course
Review.Contenu: Where is my course?  I knew that something was up as it was free.  I sure hope my information won't be sold and that I now need to block spammers...

Review.Titre: Lack of information on coupon code made me spend more money on shipping then I needed t
Review.Contenu: Your coupon code for free shipping that you gave me for signing up for your newsletter and promotions didn’t work on the one day shipping that I chose. No where did it say that the coupon code couldn’t be used on one day shipping, the coupon for free shipping just states “free shipping on your next order”. When I contacted your customer service they weren’t helpful at all and said they couldn’t do anything to credit me because the order was already sent out and they couldn’t credit me on a product I ordered either to make up for the free shipping coupon not working. I don’t appreciate spending a lot of money on your website and then not even get the  free shipping that I was promised due to the lack of information and customer service.

Review.Titre: Can’t follow instructions
Review.Contenu: The order gave me an option to delay delivery until a certain date. This was a gift, so i requested a later date, closer to the recipient’s birthday. Sporty’s just did their own thing and sent it out right away. Why even have that option?

Review.Titre: No way to cancel Pilot Training+ once you start!
Review.Contenu: I looked all over the place, but there is no way to cancel the Sporty's Pilot Training+ Membership online once you start... it will drain your account forever more.  It was cool enough for the 6 months that I used it, now it's become the worst choice of the year. Why would you offer a subscription with no way to cancel?

Review.Titre: My order was placed before 5
Review.Contenu: My order was placed before 5, albeit it was close. Still, I met the requirement for shipping that day. I guess the 5pm deadline is an estimate on a Friday. I am still waiting for the next day shipping I paid for to actually be shipped. The $58 I spent was supposed to get it here today. However, it’s still not shipped. I will look elsewhere next time I need aviation equipment.

Review.Titre: I think Sporty's sends more junk emails…
Review.Contenu: I think Sporty's sends more junk emails than all other sources I have come across combined.

Review.Titre: Your site for me 2ea orders would not…
Review.Contenu: Your site for me 2ea orders would not take discount code for free ship So I had to pay shippingDoug

Review.Titre: $10 for shipping is too much
Review.Contenu: $10 for shipping is too much, but there's nowhere else to get some of the supplies I need.

Review.Titre: When I ordered it said back ordered
Review.Contenu: When I ordered it said back ordered. I got in a preowned unit today. I’m happy it was early, just didn’t realize it was going to be used.

Review.Titre: Shipping department doesn’t read the order fields
Review.Contenu: I bought the radio now because it was on sale, I’ve wanted it for a long time, and I could buy now and have it shipped later.   I filled out the buy now ship later field with a date 10 days in the future ( when I will be home). An hour later I got an email saying it was shipped and would arrive 5 days before I got home!

Review.Titre: things to imporve
Review.Contenu: I ordered over $700 and found it surprising that you do not provide free freight when many of your competitors do over certain amount (or any in case of Amazon).The most important and expensive item was on backorder so I was forced to cancel it and order elsewhere. I try to remain loyal to you and other smaller outfits but sometimes you are not competitive.

Review.Titre: Still waiting
Review.Contenu: Paid for two courses (Flying with ForeFlight and Garmin G1000 checkout, instant online access).  Received a confirmation email saying "Start using your new Sporty's Course."  Still unable to access either course 24 hrs later.  Previously purchased courses were accessible much more quickly.

Review.Titre: I never got confirmation that my item…
Review.Contenu: I never got confirmation that my item shipped, or a confirmation number.

Review.Titre: Tried to buy four sets of ear…
Review.Contenu: Tried to buy four sets of ear protection or headset wouldn't let me check out and every time I went back to do it it added four more sets it did it four times I had to finally get off Sportys cancel everything out go back in and do it again then it wouldn't except my credit card even though it was on file and I used it two weeks ago.

Review.Titre: Great Products but Their Marketing is Obnoxious
Review.Contenu: Great products but their marketing is obnoxious. I unsubscribe to a ton of it but, then, order something else and get a whole new flood of e-mails just because I ordered some product. I like their product offering but the marketing volume leaves me not wanting to do business with them.

Review.Titre: When I was ordering, my free shipping offer disappeared and customer service did not respond.
Review.Contenu: When I was ordering, I received a pop up saying that I could get free shipping. When I came to the shipping page, I got an error stating that they were unable to quote shipping charges at this time. I tried later and was able to get past that point, but my free shipping had disappeared. I sent a message to the support text line, but did not get a response. So I lost my offer for free shipping. I should have ordered the headset through Amazon. I get free shipping there.

Review.Titre: Back in 2020 (per-covid) I ordered the…
Review.Contenu: Back in 2020 (per-covid) I ordered the instrument rating course and as a promotional the flying with foreflight course. Just purchased the foreflight course again not knowing it only comes with a one year license, I would've thought something like that once you had the license it was yours for good to look back on and review. Apparently not...a little disappointed.

Review.Titre: Seems to be USED!
Review.Contenu: I received the FLIGHT GEAR USB 12/24 Quick Charger (type A & C) today and it appears to be USED. There are numerous scratched on the face. It seems to work okay but seriously, send out USED for NEW? I can submit a photo if you want.

Review.Titre: Mis -representation of available product
Review.Contenu: It’s disingenuous to show a relatively quick product arrival date at the time an order is made leading the customer to think it’s in stock, but then after the transaction was completed, to send an email stating its back ordered and will extend the arrival date nearly a week later!!!

Review.Titre: Ordered a software download and the…
Review.Contenu: Ordered a software download and the website said I should expect my code in 24 hours which makes sense as I would assume only computers are involved.  5 days later I called and was told they were “out of codes, but, could generate one manually “. Not sure how that makes any sense.  Instead of just letting the order sit there until I called in I would think someone should have at least emailed me.  Better yet, since they could get me a code within hours, how about doing that without being asked.

Review.Titre: When I saw this C-130 I thought it…
Review.Contenu: When I saw this C-130 I thought it looked awesome and had to have it. I'm a prior C-130 med tech/flight nurse. When I finally received it and set it up, I was disappointed. It doesn't look 3D and for the price I was expecting more. Unfortunately I'm going to return it but will keep an eye out for something else.

Review.Titre: Poor details in the product listing
Review.Contenu: I was very disappointed with the details in the product listing for the item I purchased. First of all, I had to go to the manufacturer's website to find out what was included. Second, even though the product requires an external power source, there was no information about the voltage / amperage required now what the power consumption of the unit is so that I could figure out an acceptable capacity for the power bank.

Review.Titre: Your search leaves much to be desired
Review.Contenu: Your search leaves much to be desired. I searched handheld transcerivers and the item I bought did not come up on your site. I found it when I searched throgh Google and that lead me to the item I bought at your site. I have OFTEN had problems finding items at Sproty's site through your search. I wish you would try it yourself and see how poorly it works. Glad you asked.

Review.Titre: I ordered a total of 4 sectionals but at ck out it showed only 2.
Review.Contenu: I ordered 2 sectionals. Current and next issue. That makes two of each for a total of 4 sectionals. At check out time the total sectionals showed only 1 of each for a total of 2.  BUTT,, the final total amount of money owed, with tax, was correct.  The only way the final amount can be correct is if 4 sectionals were paid for.  What??????  HELLO!!!   I will wait and see what is delivered.  (Don't ya hate higher math?)

Review.Titre: I have an account
Review.Contenu: I have an account, but the system did not recognize the Password. Multiple attempts to change/update FAILED! My Captcha Reputation is Poor???Next, the billing address and shipping address are different, but the system FAILED to accept the difference.So, I know you are going to have to contact me when the system does recognize the difference.VERY FRUSTRATING! Should have been a 2 minute transaction, instead turned into an ORDEAL,But on a positive note, the demo presentation was very good.

Review.Titre: Website not easy
Review.Contenu: I wanted to use Sporty's because of the excellent print catalog I received by mail. However, It took time and effort to get to Sporty's website online. Sporty's was buried under multiple superceeding pilot product websites. Maybe you are not paying Google enough?Website for me was very slow. I had to log out and log back in on a different device and it was again slow.

Review.Titre: Good content but site slow and unresponsive
Review.Contenu: There is really great content on the site. In trying to make a purchase, the cart didn't update quickly so I ended up with more quantities of the item than I wanted. Had to start over at least 6 times. PayPal connectivity was also problematic each time o tried to complete the transaction. I was hesitant to use the pay by credit card option since there were no indications that it was a secure and encrypted process.

Review.Titre: Web Site Slow and Major Trouble Completing My Order
Review.Contenu: The products and catalog seem fine. However, the web site was slow and I had major trouble checking out with my order. My internet speed is very fast, and I was using Chrome as my browser. I was not able to complete the checkout processes in that when I would try and submit my order the page would sit idling and never move on even after waiting 15 minutes and other times trying to refresh the page. I finally had to use Firefox in a Portable Apps format to complete my order.

Review.Titre: The item I ordered is back ordered…
Review.Contenu: The item I ordered is back ordered until April 5.  Today is March 2.  The biggest thing that did not impress me is that I still had to pay $14 in shipping for something I won't get for over a month!.  If I didn't have a gift card to your store, I would have shopped elsewhere.

Review.Titre: I ordered a product that was due in…
Review.Contenu: I ordered a product that was due in September. I received no notice or communication that it was delayed until November. I called to see when that product would be available if November was realistic and I received very poor customer service. The suggestion was to cancel the order and try later. Not at all helpful. Now I’m being asked to rate your service on a recent purchase?

Review.Titre: Not professional at all I paid for 2…
Review.Contenu: Not professional at all I paid for 2 days shipping and after 2 days I email them and now they tell me it’s out of stuck till 2 weeks so if I didn’t email them I wouldn’t know anything and  when something is out of stuck they have to say it before you buy I’ll have to wait because I really need the kneeboard AND talking the the costumer service was unprofessional

Review.Titre: Ordered a Yaesu FTA550L Radio
Review.Contenu: Ordered a Yaesu FTA550L radio that said it was In Stock when I placed the order 9/6 and the receipt said should arrive by 9/13 it is now 10/23  and I still don't have my radio!  Why did it say "In Stock" when it clearly was not?  Why did it say arriving by 9/13 when you knew darn good and well that it wouldn't arrive by that date!  WHERE IS MY RADIO???

Review.Titre: Why would I ever purchase a…
Review.Contenu: Why would I ever purchase a downloadable software from Sporty's   on a weekend only to find that the activation code will be sent at a later date. The weekends are when we have time to do these things and having to wait until M-F is ridiculous!!!!!  I would rather pay a few bucks  more and have an instant download.  So disappointing.

Review.Titre: Shopping Experience
Review.Contenu: This is a review of the shopping experience, not the product (I think that is what they are asking for).  I’m not happy that it is $10 shipping for the recipient of an online course to get a small box basically just saying that they received on online course.  I’m also not pleased that Sportys doesn’t accept American Express.  Neither seems like a customer focus.  Perhaps a profit focus despite customer satisfaction impact.  I do think the course I ordered will be good—it had strong reviews.

Review.Titre: I hope they are right
Review.Contenu: I hope I ordered the right ear pad replacements. I tried to ask many people from Sporty's and no one would commit to an answer. We will see when they arrive. I usually get great service and very knowledgable responses when ordering items. I was going to order the foreflight  sentry mini ADS-B but I guess the offer of turning in the scout for a credit on the sentry mini is not available anymore.

Review.Titre: Misleading/inaccurate shipping information
Review.Contenu: Poor shipping quality and service by Sporty’s. Item labels created before order procurement so it is inaccurate and even misleading if you expect packages. Still not have received after Sporty’s budget shipping decisions on quality products.

Review.Titre: The checkout page takes a long time to…
Review.Contenu: The checkout page takes a long time to load. On the first try, after clicking "Place Order" nothing happened for 10 minutes. It was just showing the loading circle. I tried again and was finally able to place the order.A simple website like this should not take this much to load. Please fix the checkout page.

Review.Titre: Delayed shipping
Review.Contenu: The reason I am giving only 3 stars is I ordered a transceiver in July, when I ordered it, I was told it would be shipped by august.  Here it is October and I get an email stating it will be shipped in November.  Therefore cancelled my order and had to order a more expensive transceiver to get one sooner.

Review.Titre: No method of tracking orders without an account.
Review.Contenu: Ordering was simple. I didn’t want to receive a bunch of advertisement emails so I didn’t create an account. Unfortunately, I can’t track the status of my order without an account. I created an account with the email I used to make my order.  There’s no orders on file. I have no way of tracking the status of my order.   I have no shipping notifications and the package should arrive today based on correspondence I received in email. I seriously doubt my package is arriving today and I’d like to be able to track it.  Hopefully, the package doesn’t arrive while I’m away and fall victim to porch pirates.

Review.Titre: The shipping rate was not specified
Review.Contenu: The shipping rate was not specified. I ordered an item that's on back order. I shouldn't be charged shipping for the item if it's on back order. My order is over $100 so technically I shouldn't have to pay for shipping all together.

Review.Titre: Sporty's will lie to you.
Review.Contenu: I initially left a 5 star review for Sporty's, but after my recent experience with customer service I have to alter my review.I purchased a very particular ram yoke mount for an iPad mini which had the clamping post oriented parallel to the direction of the yoke (as was pictured) and the mount I received had the ball oriented 90 degrees straight up, which blocked a couple instruments on my airplane.Gabe at customer service told me multiple times that it was an "illusion of the image" because of how it was rotated and after speaking to a supervisor, (who still insisted that it was the same mount) I got her to admit it was indeed a different product.They offered to give me a refund on the product and the expedited shipping I paid for, which is why they get 2 stars instead of 1.

Review.Titre: Three items I intended to by where all…
Review.Contenu: Three items I intended to by where all out of stock. I had to buy on the competitor site. I joined the Flight Crew membership so I can have free shipping, if only they had items to ship.

Review.Titre: Website stuck on payment page Sunday…
Review.Contenu: Website stuck on payment page Sunday night and could not complete order. Tried on 3 different devices and 2 different browsers.  Called customer service, they were more interested in taking order than correcting the issue

Review.Titre: My billing and shipping addresses are…
Review.Contenu: My billing and shipping addresses are different but your change address link doesn't work.  And, I have a free shipping code but there was no place to put it so I didn't get free shipping.  What's the deal?

Review.Titre: I am not very happy with what I have…
Review.Contenu: I am not very happy with what I have seen so far of this course.  I have bought many aviation educational materials from sporty's over the years, from Private Pilot, Commercial Pilot, Mutiengine, Instrument Rating, Instrument Instructor, Ground Instructor, Aviation Weather and all were excellent. The best courses sold by Sporty's were Glen Endsley's courses.  This course is not Glen Endsley's series.  It is lacking in so many ways.  I am only on Section 1, but it is cumbersome to get through, no written materials come with it and frankly, for the premium price, this UAS course is nothing near the quality of instruction that I have come to expect from Sporty's Pilot Shop.  Robert Cline SE&MEL, Ground and Instrument Instructor.

Review.Titre: Takeoff and Landings Course
Review.Contenu: Takeoff and Landings Course - If it is not a gift - Sportys says No- For You - Instant Online Acess ---- Not true I'm still waiting and it's been over 52 minutes. I wanted to view it before my flight lessons tomorrow.

Review.Titre: I did receive one of the items I…
Review.Contenu: I did receive one of the items I ordered in a timely manner. However, the David Clark headset I ordered, which was on back order and was told would ship on November 19, has not shipped as of this date. Today I looked at your website and learned the item is still out of stock and will now not be available until December 3, 2021. I am disappointed I have not been notified of this information. I have had excellent service from one of your competitors (who had the headset in stock) when ordering headsets, but decided to give you a try because of your 60 day return policy as theirs is only a 30 day return policy.  A notification of the delay in shipping would be great customer service.

Review.Titre: You had the product I wanted
Review.Contenu: You had the product I wanted, but charged almost $10 shipping (GROUND) for a $12 product that doesn’t weigh a pound. And I am left with no indication when I will get the product.

Review.Contenu: Hi.I can not get in touch with anyone after payment... Live chat is not up, no email response... I hope someone follows through...to see any problems encountered

Review.Contenu: Once again I tried to create an account and like my last attempt, I couldn't do it. Being able to see the password might help. Only guessing that is the problem.

Review.Titre: I purchased an ebook
Review.Contenu: I purchased an ebook. I expected it would be immediately available but it isn’t. I don’t understand the delay. Bummed. I was ready to start studying.

Review.Titre: I am a CFII and I have been a sportys…
Review.Contenu: I am a CFII and I have been a sportys customer since 2015. I am usually very happy with the products I purchase at sportys. The reason I only give 2 stars today is because I have spent thousands of dollars with sportys and I still had to pay for shipping on a high dollar item. Also I always see a promo code box to fill in but I have never ever seen or been given a promo code for a discount. When I called Sportys CS today to ask about getting free shipping for my purchase they informed me that if I paid an annual membership fee I could then receive free shipping. I think that sportys is getting a little greedy with regards to requiring this fee. High dollar item or dedicated repeat customers should be getting a break on shipping IMO. I am now going to start weighing ALL my options from now on for my aviation needs. Sorry Sportys, you really let me down today.

Review.Titre: Sporty’s customer service is terrible.
Review.Contenu: Sporty’s customer service is terrible. I ordered what was supposed to be a 110 volt ac adapter for their JD 200 Radio. Paid by PayPal and when received they had sent the wrong one which was a 230 Volt adapter that would not work. Called customer service about trying to get a replacement or refund. The lady was very rude and said I could only send it back which I told her I was unable to do due to the fact I cannot drive to get it to the post office. All she could suggest was that I order the correct one and I had already spent almost 30 dollars on the wrong one and was certainly not going to send money again for them to possibly send the wrong item again. Do they not know the items that work with their products?. She was not very friendly or helpful in any way and I would never after this recommend sporty’s to anyone at all because of poor customer service and unwillingness to help when they sent the wrong item. I did not order a 230V adapter.

Review.Titre: Crosswind Gear Bag
Review.Contenu: I purchased the Crosswind gear bag recently and I have to say I am very disappointed with the purchase. I really wanted to love this bag but I don't. Its just not a good quality bag in my opinion. Maybe a $20-$30 bag but certainly not a $70 bag. Not even close! The bottom is very weak and there is no support. Whatever you put in the main compartment causes the bag to sag in the middle. Causing the rest of the bag to lose shape and kinda fold up.The headset compartment is difficult. The shoulder strap connection is literally directly over the zipper area. So you have to pull it out of the way every time you remove and replace the headset Design flaw making it annoying. The 2 slash pockets on the outside back are on the same side of the bag as the gear mod felt inside the bag. This side of the bag, the wallop the bag is very flimsy and weak causing the slash pockets to stay hanging open and sagging. Anything in left in these pockets are not secure. There goes the peace of mind that my gear is secure. I would never use those pockets for that reason. The shoulder strap is very cheaply made. No adjustable padding as it is actually sewn in place and is very cheap feeling. Overall this bag just feels weak and cheap. What I would expect from a $20 bag from Walmart but certainly not what I expected from a $70 bag, with the"embroidery", from an aviation supplier like Sporty's. Big mistake I made by getting the custom embroidery because now Im stuck with a bag with my name on it that I will not be using.

Review.Titre: Bag  is fine but website said $79.95…
Review.Contenu: Bag  is fine but website said $79.95 special for holiday. Expect reduced price.

Confusing checkout on gift cards.
