Review.Contenu: Can’t track my order—wish I could see where my merchandise is. Other than this, it was fine.

Review.Titre: Purchasing the learn to fly course was…
Review.Contenu: Purchasing the learn to fly course was great. I only wish the website showed the option for the gear bag and book bundle you had available. It’s not available as a bundle elsewhere. Or if you update an allow purchase of just the books/equipment after the course.

Review.Titre: Online PPL Course and site UX.
Review.Contenu: Purchased the online course and it's mediocre, logging in to different devices it won't carry your progress across, so you in essence have to stick to one device. You also have to log in twice when using a computer and their UX needs some work. Their practice tests are good though.

Review.Titre: Web Site not easy to use
Review.Contenu: Web Site not easy to use.   Seems cumbersome to select shipping and billing and sometimes, doesn't work.    I would have thought it would be a bit more user friendly.

Review.Titre: I asked a question in the comments…
Review.Contenu: I asked a question in the comments section and nobody responded to me.

Review.Titre: Customer service was vague on their…
Review.Contenu: Customer service was vague on their instructions during the first encounter with them.

Review.Titre: The course I bought didn’t show up
Review.Contenu: The course I bought didn’t show up, but customer service was able to fix it

Review.Titre: It cost almost as much to ship it as…
Review.Contenu: It cost almost as much to ship it as the knee board cost. Very disappointed!

Review.Titre: I thought I would receive an online PDF…
Review.Contenu: I thought I would receive an online PDF of this as well.

Review.Titre: Good product, bad packaging, possibly used at the prices of new
Review.Contenu: Good product, bad packaging, possibly used at the prices of newThe mount seems to be well and solidly built.However, the parts seems to be used. The connecting bar and the mounting plate had not packaging (not even a plastic bag) and had scuff marks. it seemed I was sent returned parts though I was charged full price.I was even charged $12 for shipping and handling that is free at Amazon.   Disappointed at the experience. Will look elsewhere for my future needs.

Review.Titre: Great real world information
Review.Contenu: Great real world information on the instrument knowledge test prep, but i’d like more test questions that closer resemble previous tests from the FAA. Honestly more quiz questions would be great in general. I would also like the ability to Mark and unmark questions at any point during the session reviews or after. I would also like more bullet points in the review section.

Review.Titre: Great selection but a few basic customer experience issues
Review.Contenu: A few issues with this store: poor return policy, charging for shipping, and they don't accept Amex. While they do carry a very well curated selection of aviation products, they tend to be my last resort due to the issues above. These days, a customer expects a return label and a painless process if they want to make a return. And if I'm spending several hundred dollars, a $10 shipping fee is just a slap in the face. They don't accept Amex, but you can check out with Paypal using your Amex.

Review.Titre: Flight Gear HP BI-Fold Kneeboard not up to Par
Review.Contenu: I was not happy with the quality of the Flight Gear HP Bi-Fold Kneeboarding. The removable kneeboard was stuck to the clear plastic cover and when I removed it white marks from the printing on the board stuck to the inside of the plastic ruining it, so that when you put the board back in you won’t be able to read some of the printed info that is on the board through the plastic. And the printing on the board itself is not readable because the white lettering is smudged in some places.

Review.Titre: My old account info wouldn't update
Review.Contenu: My old account info wouldn't update, so when I placed the order it doubled up on the five (5) items I wanted to order.It was not clear that a password reset had been sent to my email, so I am still not certain whether my new password has been accepted.  At the time of my order, it was still asking me to sign in, despite the fact that I thought I had successfully changed my password.

Review.Titre: The link in the email apparently works…
Review.Contenu: The link in the email apparently works for computers but does not work on IOS devices. After several attempts, I called Sportys and was told I needed to use the app. It was an easy fix but eliminating the frustration up front would be better. Perhaps in the email rather than saying click on the link which takes you back to the purchase page, state “if you’re using and IOS device, you’ll need to download the app first”.

Review.Titre: If it was a snake it would have bit me!
Review.Contenu: The plane I purchased (L 10/11) is good but you can't retract the landing gear. Plus it is a little heavy.  I looked for the less expensive models but couldn't find them until the catalog came in($30 vs. $7).  Oh well.

Review.Titre: I love that Sporty’s had what I wanted
Review.Contenu: I love that Sporty’s had what I wanted. Somehow I ordered my stuff as a guest. I could not find an easy way to track my order on the site. I had to contact them through a chat window to get an update.

Review.Titre: I had trouble locating the checkout…
Review.Contenu: I had trouble locating the checkout button. I added all the information need to buy but there seemed to be no button to go to check out on the screen. I had to go back and push join check the join the newsletter information to get the system to go to pay and checkout. However, I don't have any real concerns about receiving information.

Review.Titre: Charging for items out of stock.
Review.Contenu: I like sportys and have ordered a lot in the past few years.  What I don't like is being charged for items you don't have in stock.  If an item is back ordered you shouldn't be charging customers for the item until you ship it to them.  No one else I deal with does this, how can you take money for the sale of something you openly state you don't possess?

Review.Titre: I'm not sure if it was your web site or…
Review.Contenu: I'm not sure if it was your web site or me, but for some reason I found your store search to be cumbersome.  It took me a while and a number of tries to find the item I was looking for and would have given up if I were not assured by another person that they got the item (lightweight, clip-on VLDs) from you.The VLDs, if like the ones I used previously, are quite a nice item, Slightly pricey, but that is probably normal for a low production-run item, like this.

Review.Titre: Had to change password to log into…
Review.Contenu: Had to change password to log into account. Seven numbers without letters did not work (my old password).Had to cycle between Cart and Shopping to find the paperless version of eFIRC submission to add to the cart. Finally decided to wait on that.

Review.Titre: Product information is incomplete.
Review.Contenu: Good Product Selection.  Product dimension and other information is incomplete for multiple items.  I wanted to purchase a Flight Gear iPad Bag BUT your dimension information and photos DO NOT provide significant information to purchase the item. I just purchased a Bose A20 from you but didn't want to bother with a bag return.  So no sale.  BUT compared to other businesses you still do an outstanding job!

Review.Titre: Found exactly what I wanted....but
Review.Contenu: Found exactly what I wanted....butTrying to get the billing address and shipping address correct, not successful.  Also sending as a gift - and it defaulted everything to the recipient.  Even went back and changed things a few times to try to get it to 'stick' - and it still had incorrect information.  I hoped that creating an account after I placed my order. would correct the issue for future orders, but the billing and shipping are still incorrect.

Review.Titre: I’ve had several positive transactions…
Review.Contenu: I’ve had several positive transactions with Sporty’s - good products, and timely service.Two things I wonder about - shipping costs seem unusual sometimes. I’ve just ordered a $13 log book holder made of nylon, and without seeing it yet, I’m going to guess it’s a few ounces, tops. Shipping is just over $9.00 - to get it a couple of states over, USPS. Seems high to me. The other thing I wonder about is the amount of marketing email that comes with each purchase. Hey, I want them to be successful too, but my inbox gets a bit crowded with Sporty’s stuff. Yep - I can opt out - which is easy enough, but it seems like a lot of marketing. I’d buy more if shipping was more reasonable - just sayin’.

Review.Titre: Good follow up customer service
Review.Contenu: I had originally posted a poor review because of the email I received that my purchase was back ordered when it had shown available when I purchased it. There was no timeline for it being back in stock. I received a response in a very short period of time explaining the mishap and that my purchase was actually out for delivery. I appreciate the immediate clarifying response. Thank you!

Review.Titre: Cart Bug
Review.Contenu: The site has a few bug and looks pretty outdated. I noticed adding and removing items from the cart is finicky. I would also like to see more model airplanes for learning. Happy used interface besides the look and feel. Good selection and organization.

Review.Titre: Untrained & Afraid…?
Review.Contenu: I was trying to order off the website, but was told my account was temporarily locked.  I called the 800 number.  I tried to order pilot training+ through a young man that seemed very new and unsure of what he was doing. Three times he asked a female what to do, and finally seemed to give up by telling me to call back Monday.

Review.Titre: I saw a flight bag on promotional sale…
Review.Contenu: I saw a flight bag on promotional sale & wanted to order it. When I added it to my shopping cart it charged Me full price. That is a bait & switch  I would like a refund on the discounted price for the leather bag that I was charged $160 for.

Review.Titre: Great product availability, but...
Review.Contenu: Great product availability and well organized site. Your product videos (on youtube) are also quite informative and helpful. However, your shipping charges, especially on big ticket items (I've spent nearly $2,000 US in the last 30 days) are a negative point that if a competitor arises, I'll give them a look based on that alone. Most modern eCommerce vendors have a "free shipping if above x dollars" -- Sporty's has no such option.

Review.Titre: Finally got the order in
Review.Contenu: Finally got the order in. Called on telephone to place order and representative was pleasant but not very informed. Had to look up item on my telephone because I was not at my home computer (which I don't like doing) and the order went in OK. I was disappointed I could no longer just make a telephone call and place order. Would be out of luck if I didn't have a smart phone.

Review.Titre: I paid for 1 day delivery
Review.Contenu: I paid for 1 day delivery. But it didn’t come for 2 days. This was a gift for 1st solo flight. It was important to get it on time , so I could present it right after she completed the flight. I was very upset that Sporty’s didn’t refund the postage.After this review, Sporty’s sent notice they would refund the shipping. I am very glad they stepped up to answer complaint.

Review.Titre: Would’ve been much better but f I had…
Review.Contenu: Would’ve been much better but f I had received the free shipping that was supposed to be granted! I put the code in yet I was still charged $11 for shipping. Which is not a problem had I not been told I would be granted free shipping on my first order!

Review.Titre: Never received the email from Sporty's…
Review.Contenu: Never received the email from Sporty's stating the gift card emails I ordered were sent to the recipients, as stated would be. Unable to see on the Sporty's My Account website how to track its completion. Guess I'll have to call the recipient and verify they did receive the gift cards.

Review.Titre: I had ordered the wrong charger for my…
Review.Contenu: I had ordered the wrong charger for my A25C radio. When I tried to get the correct charger with supports help they sent me the wrong product again. Only to be discovered once it showed up. I am returning all of these and have found the correct product on my own.

Review.Titre: I tried to order this item a couple of…
Review.Contenu: I tried to order this item a couple of days ago, but could not get the item into the cart, nor could I get the site to accept my embroidery request.    It worked today but the drop down menus interfere with the viewing of the selected item.  Anyway, it is ordered and we look forward to it's arrival.

Review.Titre: It is supposed to be instant online…
Review.Contenu: It is supposed to be instant online access. Though the online course was ordered on Sunday, when the web store states instant online access, one would think it is instant. it took 15 - 20 minutes for instant online access.

Review.Titre: Once I found the bifold iPad kneeboard
Review.Contenu: Once I found the bifold iPad kneeboard, the site is fine, easy to use.  Nice link to a video review.  But it didn't show up on a search for "bifold iPad kneeboard"  Bunch of other kneeboards and similar products showed up.  But not the one with the extra pockets and angled velcro gizmo

Review.Titre: sale was easy. getting back into website..not so much
Review.Contenu: the shopping experience was good and i probably will get my item on the expected date but the website isn't very reliable.....i tried to log back in today to look at order status and it wont recognize my password...so i tried a reset and it said it sent a email link to reset it but its been 30 min and i still have yet to receive it

Review.Titre: Not happy yet
Review.Contenu: I had trouble with the site. It was very slow. Consequently you felt it necessary to let me know my items were still in the cart. That would have been fine, except you sent the message to my husband, and it was supposed to be a surprise gift! You spoiled the surprise.

Review.Titre: Given delivery date does not match the actual date.
Review.Contenu: Online order was easy and friendly. I placed my order Friday, 18th NOV with promise it will arrive Saturday, 19th NOV. Now FEDEX tracker shows delivery on Wednesday, 23 NOV. Feels like I was mislead because I planned accordingly. I might go with Amazon next time because they deliver on time!

Review.Titre: Website showed two identical shipping…
Review.Contenu: Website showed two identical shipping addresses.It was not clear that I had to select one.After several tries and emails back and forth to/from support, I did that and the site would then let me continue to the payment section.

Review.Titre: I got a text message saying I would get…
Review.Contenu: I got a text message saying I would get free ground shipping on my first order, so today I tried to place one and used the code sent to me via text message. It was rejected every time I tried to use it. So... I guess signing up for things didn't really get me free shipping.

Review.Titre: Hello there...I tried to place an…
Review.Contenu: Hello there...I tried to place an on-line order on 7/3 and 7/4 and the website and on-line chat were not available and then I placed my order and you do not accept American Express.

Review.Titre: You need to have the IT guys work on…
Review.Contenu: You need to have the IT guys work on the options about billing address and shipping address.My order seem to go through fine but my actual credit card address is my PO box while I wanted this order shipped to home so I would not have to wait in line at the Post office to pick up a package

Review.Titre: Web site not friendly.
Review.Contenu: Website wants you to click extra boxes so you can send me information I do not want. Secondly, you do not take American Express, makes the shopping experience unpleasant. If I had another choice to purchase the product I would have gone to that site.

Review.Titre: A little disappointed
Review.Contenu: A little disappointed.  I guess it's because of my not reading the "fine print". Not being an active pilot, I was not aware of the different charts.  I use my older SP-4 plotter for other purposed rather than flight planning.  I was looking for a replacement for my older SP-4 flight plotter.  When I did a search on your web site your "Forever Sectional Plotter" popped up.  Believing it was the same, I ordered it.  There is a huge difference between the two; 1) the SP-4 is only 8 3/4" long and fits in one's shirt pocket; 2) the scales (both nautical and statute) are completely different (being a x2 variation).

Review.Titre: The website needs some serious work
Review.Contenu: The website needs some serious work. Upon logging in, my cart was empty after adding many items to it. The cart was also not functioning properly when trying to add items. The website was very slow to respond. Other than that, great prices!

Review.Titre: Resetting Instrument Proficiency Check course
Review.Contenu: I need to take the Instrument Proficiency check course again (fresh IPC). It is unclear how I reset the course to do so. I bought a new course but the course still shows completion state for the last time I took it. This is a chronic problem that Sportys needs to solve.

Review.Titre: No incentive for regular customers
Review.Contenu: website was easy to navigate and the item I wanted was in stock. After placing my order today, I received an email offering me free shipping on the next order.  The reason for 3 stars is why didn't you offer me free shipping for the current order?  I am a regular customer with 5 chart subscriptions. I have spent over $1500.00 at Sporty's in the past year. Now I'm expected to place another order to get free shipping? I searched for a coupon code for free shipping but couldn't find one that worked. It would be nice to receive a small incentive once in a while for regular customers.

Review.Titre: The aviation products are first rate…
Review.Contenu: The aviation products are first rate and the pricing is in line with the product.  The internet web site is difficult to manage, many instructions are shown very small or at the bottom of the pages. Could use some modification.

Review.Titre: Process was easy enough
Review.Contenu: Process was easy enough. My issue is that I signed up for the email and texts to get free shipping and did not get free shipping. I applied the code and it didn’t work.

Review.Titre: The fact that there is no free…
Review.Contenu: The fact that there is no free shipping, not even when you spend over $300 is insane to me. This seems customary at this point with most shops today if you spend over a certain amount of money.

Review.Titre: Good products, Frustrating Shipping
Review.Contenu: Good products.  Frustrating shipping.Wouldn't let me ship to my office address and wouldn't even save my office address, instead telling me "No such entity with address ID 114826"

Review.Titre: It was a bit difficult to get my…
Review.Contenu: It was a bit difficult to get my shipping address different from my card address.  The system just kept locking up.  Maybe it was because I'm ordering from Kenya; I don't know.

Review.Titre: Attempted to order the deluxe via…
Review.Contenu: Attempted to order the deluxe via computer and the phone. However, the website kept showing an error. Note: website stated "in stock." Nevertheless, purchased was with the cheapest due being the only available.

Review.Titre: The website needs to be improved and…
Review.Contenu: The website needs to be improved and the cart check out is out dated and unable to handle new street addresses that are handled easily within UPS, USPS, FedX and Amazon.

Review.Titre: There is no Back button
Review.Contenu: There is no Back button. So if you click to look at something there is no way to go back to where you were at.  So I would have to click the menu again. Category. And Plus sign to get back to where I was at.

Review.Titre: Free Shipping Doesn’t Apply to 2 Day Shipping
Review.Contenu: You gave me a promo code for free ground shipping, but you don’t reduce the cost if I selected 2 day shipping by the standard shipping cost you were willing to forgo. Seems poor customer relations to me.

Review.Titre: After waiting several days for my…
Review.Contenu: After waiting several days for my order, I got a call telling me it was returned by UPS.  I asked what address they had sent it to and they had put down the wrong address.

Review.Titre: Price and product are fine and I’ve…
Review.Contenu: Price and product are fine and I’ve found customer service to be responsive. However, the website didn’t allow me to sign in as a member. Minor annoyance but not what I expect in 2022.

Review.Titre: They sell a good product
Review.Contenu: They sell a good product, just wish they would tell you if the product that you are ordering is on back order before you hit the place order button. Had to cancel my order and purchase elsewhere.

Review.Titre: I signed up for emails and text and got…
Review.Contenu: I signed up for emails and text and got a code for Free Shipping. but when I put it in, it said invalid Code. I did it a few times which was a pain and then had to send a message.

Review.Titre: Generally like Sporties
Review.Contenu: Generally like Sporties, but bought a simple pilot logbook 4.5” by 8”.  It cost about $11, shipping was over $10. Doubling price. Really?

Review.Titre: Shipping out of 48 contiguous states not accurate on Website
Review.Contenu: Let me begin with I have always  had good luck with Sporty’s Pilot  Shop and will continue to use them for my aviation needs. This transaction only earned 3 stars because the website for online orders was inaccurate in regards to shipping to Hawaii. I am a member of the ship club which offers free two day shipping on my orders. After placing the order and selecting the free shipping option, I was subsequently notified that the free two day shipping did not apply to Hawaii and Alaska. I’m fine with that and understand the reason but I maintain that when you select Hawaii or Alaska in the shipping address the website should eliminate the free two day shipping option. Sporty’s is better than that and can provide better Customer service in this regard. Please fix the website! I was initially notified that I would need to cancel the order and start over. I was not very happy about that. Thankfully, a Supervisor  got involved and just adjusted the shipping charge for me.

Review.Titre: Hope this helps
Review.Contenu: It kept showing you were not in about 6 times during my order process once would have been good twice maybe it was over top of what I was ordering just a little frustrating but overall good thank you

Review.Titre: Ordered a pilot license plaque and had…
Review.Contenu: Ordered a pilot license plaque and had to print off the form an fax info. I thought by now we should be able to do it online directly. Also the process was not well printed had to call twice

Review.Titre: No Shipping Notifications
Review.Contenu: With the order acknowledgment, the e-mail stated that shipping information would follow when order shipped.  Never got shipping information…but the order did show up.  Do what you say you’re going to do, folks!

Review.Titre: Defects
Review.Contenu: On July 27 2022 I ordered three Items, A Collapsible Sunshade, Product Number 6170, a Four Color Flashlight, Product Number 8624 and a Sectional Chart.  The Sectional no problem. The Collapsible Sunshade did not contain middle Grommets in either one of the shades. Makes them difficult to mount and stay with attachment of the suction plugs to the outer rims only. Obviously, nobody checks that sort of issue!The Four Color Flashlight seems functional enough but came without a Lanyard or a Sheath.I assume a sheath would aid in keeping the "turn on buttons" from turning on by themselves, unwanted, which has now happened to me twice, unknowingly. The two light unit comes with lanyard and sheath, couldn't this unit also? So I guess I'm stuck without recourse since the description does not describe these elements, which I didn't catch.Order number on invoice - 31529097Order number given to me via confirmation of order - 2001856792. Carl R. Phillippe2086 West Davies AvenueLittleton, Colorado 80120 Not a happy camper!

Review.Titre: I had a promotion code for free…
Review.Contenu: I had a promotion code for free shipping it was not applied at check out I had to call and took 15-20 minutes on the phone to get it resolved not very happy.

Review.Titre: Critical items should be removed from…
Review.Contenu: Critical items should be removed from POS until reasonable inventory is resolved. Supply chain disruption is due to international shipping via ports. There are no restrictions on air cargo.

Review.Titre: Good but...
Review.Contenu: Accessing via the web the program is very clunky.  The video clips range in time but are all in short snippets. The program will not automatically forward to the next video. It simply hangs as if it's loading but never does. You have to manually stop and scroll to the next video. If you are casting to a TV this is most annoying.  Using the Sportys app provides a much better experience but still doesn't load the next video. Perhaps this is by design but I would prefer watch straight through since the information is simply a review and the clips are short.The program also offers written resources for each video lesson which offers a good in depth follow-up to the video snippet.Despite the aforementioned the program is organized well and the information is helpful.

Review.Titre: I found the check out process to be a…
Review.Contenu: I found the check out process to be a bit clunky.  I hadn't used your site for several years and so forgot my PW - and had to reset it - but it took several tries to complete that.

Review.Titre: It was a bit disappointing that there…
Review.Contenu: It was a bit disappointing that there were so many items out of stock. Headsets, iPad mount, study materials, flight bags. I had to order the out of stock items from a competitors site.

Review.Titre: Ordered a single chart supplement…
Review.Contenu: Ordered a single chart supplement (think AFD from days old). $6 + for the pub but over $10 for standard shipping. Really?

Review.Titre: Site needs work
Review.Contenu: Browse page needs work… attempting to change the sort by field or the sorting direction resulted in an on-screen error message, “Invalid Form Key.”

Review.Titre: I received a text with a free shipping…
Review.Contenu: I received a text with a free shipping code. However just an hour later, I placed an order and was told the code was invalid. Definitely a little disappointed with that.

Review.Titre: Back Ordered items
Review.Contenu: Ordered 2 items. 1 was on back order and the other shipped fast. The back order item was supposed to be in but I have not received any information on it's status.

Review.Titre: After 3 tries
Review.Contenu: After 3 tries, was able to "reset" my password. Almost gave up. (I've been a customer since 1968 and it was actually faster when I phoned in an order.)

Review.Titre: Promised to send my stuff before 5 pm
Review.Contenu: Promised to send my stuff before 5 pm, never happened And you don’t have A20 Bose CFI rebate, that’s why I purchased them on a different site

Review.Titre: I give this rating because the cost of…
Review.Contenu: I give this rating because the cost of most products are a bit expensive and most places will offer free shipping if you spend so much, not with Sporty :(

Review.Titre: Fine except for the pop-ups asking if I…
Review.Contenu: Fine except for the pop-ups asking if I need help, the cookie accepter, and all the multiple chat requests blowing away my simple smooth search and purchase.

Review.Titre: I placed an order with a total of…
Review.Contenu: I placed an order with a total of approximately $350 and had to pay for shipping.  Most companies I shop with would offer free shipping for that amount.

Review.Titre: Shipping SNAFU
Review.Contenu: Online order placed. Different shipping address than billing.Order was shipped to billing address so expedited shipping was a complete waste.

Review.Titre: Item was on backorder waited 2 almost 3 months
Review.Contenu: A friend ordered the same item I did about two hours after I did he got his in August and I've been waiting for mine this whole time........

Review.Titre: website wouldnt give shipping options
Review.Contenu: website wouldnt give shipping options. had to redo order and then refresh twice. almost went to another site but got it to work

Review.Titre: Not sure why you ask for review prior…
Review.Contenu: Not sure why you ask for review prior to my receiving product. Will be happy to do another review of the service after product arrives at my home.

Review.Titre: Two out of four products not in stock
Review.Contenu: Two out of four products not in stock, and have to wait until February for one of the items to be shopped.  A sign of the times I guess.

Review.Titre: Not intuitive
Review.Contenu: Not intuitive. Too much figuring out for shipping. I have been regular customer for decades. Just set me up for my every time shipping.

Review.Titre: Website is pretty difficult to navigate…
Review.Contenu: Website is pretty difficult to navigate through.I ended up having to use google to find what I wanted on your website.

Review.Contenu: Seems like a good program, was bummed there wasn't free shipping. Would have give 4 stars for that.

Review.Titre: Not accepting Amex is a bother
Review.Contenu: Not accepting Amex is a bother. If I can find the same product on Amazon, get free shipping, and use my Amex … I will.

Lost out on free shipping
Review.Contenu: Lost out on free shippingSort of disappointed to order one day and find out you were offering free shipping the next day.

Review.Titre: International shipping cost are awfull…
Review.Contenu: International shipping cost are awfull but still the overall cost is cheaper on the sentry ads-b than the other sellers.

Review.Titre: Delivery problem
Review.Contenu: Hello I needed to reorder as the first book never arrived (It seems to be problem of USPS but NO TRACKING INFO)

Review.Titre: Too difficult to purchase EFIRC and go…
Review.Contenu: Too difficult to purchase EFIRC and go back and forth between a new account, meanwhile I aready had an account.

Review.Titre: Good products/Meh Website
Review.Contenu: Good selection of products,  but I've found the website difficult to use. And they don't take Amex.

Review.Titre: Good points
Review.Contenu: Good pointsHelpful customer service team/ quick delivery Improvement pointsI received an email offering free shipping.  the email was misleading and left somewhat of a bad after taste. Free delivery option very restrictive. Hence not really a offer of any merit

Review.Titre: One of the best for test prep, not the best video delivery.
Review.Contenu: My favorite part about Sportys is the fact that I have to log in multiple times to get to my course.....but on a serious note the test prep was extremely helpful and definitely assisted in passing the written exam, their course is kind of dry, I have heard that Kings is more informative during the learning process.

Review.Titre: I went ahead and ordered a Sentry ADS-B…
Review.Contenu: I went ahead and ordered a Sentry ADS-B receiver because they were on back order until mid September. Was charged for the purchase well before shipping. The same thing happened a year or so ago whom I ordered a Halon Fire extinguisher and that order was delayed several months. But it was about $150 versus $500.

Review.Titre: Throughout the shopping experience I…until the end
Review.Contenu: Throughout the shopping experience I was led to believe based on the order size it was free shipping. Only when I checked out did it add shipping at the last second. That aside would have given you 5 stars.

Review.Titre: Everything was fine until I tried to…
Review.Contenu: Everything was fine until I tried to use PayPal at checkout. No luck. Ended up using my credit card. Other than that, good experience

Review.Titre: "Martha" called to say that my battery…
Review.Contenu: "Martha" called to say that my battery minder had to be sent to a physical address, so I gave my physical address.  In the "your product has been shipped" email to me it still has my P.O. Box address.Not a big problem, either address will do.

Review.Titre: I was unable to get the right xnaut…
Review.Contenu: I was unable to get the right xnaut cooling pad for my iPad. I chatted and was told there was not one available for my IPad Air 5th gen.  Turns out after discussing with xnaut, it’s the same as iPad Pro 11” size wise.

Review.Titre: website functioned fine
Review.Contenu: website functioned fine. transaction was smooth. VFR Cheyenne Sectional is out of stock.

Review.Titre: Tried to order shirts
Review.Contenu: Tried to order shirts that were in the catalog but they were not to be found in the website.  Had to use chat and get a link to the product I wanted.  Not a pleasant way to do business.

Review.Titre: You sell great products, but checkout needs work
Review.Contenu: You sell great products and your site is well organized and easy to navigate.  My only issue is the checkout process.  I have had times when the checkout process stalls and there is no "next" box to check requiring  a start over to check out.  Otherwise, I would rate you 5 stars!

Review.Titre: Overall the Sporty’s purchasing experience was spot on!
Review.Contenu: Overall the Sporty’s purchasing experience went well. The website itself locked up several times and errored out during the purchasing process even with my high speed internet, but I was able to accomplish what I set out to do. I would have expected a more polished web experience, but there is always room for improvement right? So if your patient, Sportys is a good place to shop.

Review.Titre: Normally your service is very good
Review.Contenu: Normally your service is very good, but you had a slipup this time.I ordered the new Sentry with CO detector, and the confirmation email, and the order details online in my Account, both say it will arrive today, 6/17.However, calling customer service they say its backordered, and wont even arrive to Sportys till next week.   That should have been noted in the order confirmation and online, I would think.Diane was super helpful in Customer Service tho.  Thx!

Review.Titre: Need a larger map to review sectionals.
Review.Contenu: No complaints other than I was ordering charts for new areas and would like to have been able to view a larger map of overlapping sectionals to better see which charts I needed. Other than that, all is good.

Review.Titre: It’s good
Review.Contenu: Product works as advertised

Review.Titre: No time to order a Gift Card
Review.Contenu: I didn't have time to order a hard Gift Card, so I opted for the emailed version.  I see that it's primarily designed to be emailed directly to the giftee rather than the gifter. It would be nice to also have an option to print a greeting card type of certificate, kind of like what amazon offers.  Also, the option to choose a specific dollar amount rather than the set numbers would be nice.

Review.Titre: Great items! Lack of communication though...
Review.Contenu: I found what I needed and was able to order right away! However, I put in the wrong address (sent it to my neighbor's house instead of mine)  I emailed Sporty's twice to change the information before it shipped, but didn't receive any reply.  My items arrived and are just what I was looking for, but response to emails could be better.

Review.Titre: Amazing Store
Review.Contenu: Every product is made with great quality and need for pilots who fly with them. I personally bought multiple things from this website and have not regretted it. Although, the shipping cost might prevent some buyers to make a purchase.

Review.Titre: Great shop, but…
Review.Contenu: Great shop.  Only issue I can see is that you charge an enormous amount for shipping, where other options usually have free shipping available.  Its weird to spend $10 on ground shipping for a $300 item in 2022.  The only reason I bought it was because I literally couldn't get it anywhere else.  But going forward, because of this every item I can get on your store I will first look to Amazon for this reason.

Review.Titre: I received the CO2 sensor right away
Review.Contenu: I received the CO2 sensor right away. There were no instructions included with the item. I had to call the supplier (not Sporty's) who emailed the instructions right then, about 18 pages or so. The item cost almost $200 including taxes and cheapest way of shipping. The thing has to be sent back to the supplier after two years for overhaul and new battery at a cost of $100.

Review.Titre: Navigation of the site was simple
Review.Contenu: Navigation of the site was simple. The only problem I had was that I was unable to remove anything from my cart. It would say that the item didn't exist or that I couldn't remove it. I would have to clear my whole cart out anytime I wanted to remove a single item. Other than that it was great!

Review.Titre: So I placed an order and…
Review.Contenu: So I placed an order and immediately get an email with a survey link asking how did we do. I really wish companies would wait until the order is received so we can then give an honest opinion of the entire transaction. I know I'll probably get another link when the order is received but geez guys, one survey should be enough!

Review.Titre: Sportys
Review.Contenu: Sportys Sportys has exactly what I am looking for at an excellent price. I was just looking to buy some paper handbooks, and they can be bought in a bundle to save money! I am giving them 4 stars because shipping seems high (45% of my order price for one order) for the least expensive item. Granted - they did give me a code for free shipping after my first purchase, so the average shipping cost is more reasonable after this second purchase.

Review.Titre: Ordering is easy
Review.Contenu: Ordering is easy.  Delivery is prompt.  Product quality is dependable (they don't sell junk). My only issue is that most items seem to be priced over market value (i.e. on the expensive side). But I've always been satisfied with previous orders and customer service.

Review.Titre: Delivered as expected - some assembly required.
Review.Contenu: Good service, speedy delivery.  Item was exactly as described.  I haven't had a chance to take it flying yet, so haven't had a chance to test all functions. Assembly of the antenna, battery pack, and the wrist loop was easy.  But the belt clip attachment is really difficult to get on and, to make it worse, the screws for the attachment don't go all the way in.  It seems like the screws could have been made longer and be made to actually screw completely into the screw hole.  That design item should be corrected.

Review.Titre: I have not received it yet
Review.Contenu: I have not received it yet, but Sporty’s Pilot Shop was one of only a few to have a Garmin Glo in stock. The order was shipped the same day it was ordered. It is scheduled to arrive at my door 2 days after I ordered it. Fast and easy

Review.Titre: Too soon to say
Review.Contenu: This is where I find gifts for my husband 😁The site works well. It’s a bit soon for a complete review due to the fact my products haven’t shipped yet. So if I tell you that I’m good at ordering on this site and they are good at collecting my $$$ that doesn’t give a full picture. The service was good in the past and this is what brings me back. Happy Holidays

Review.Titre: Delay after purchase to use video course
Review.Contenu: The only reason for not receiving five stars is the delay in getting the online video training and expense. Why am I waiting to use it? There should be no reason to wait to start a purchased online video training program. I’ve checked my email to make sure I didn’t have to confirm my email address. I really feel this material is worth about $50, not $100.  This is also not the first online training I have purchased either. Seems odd. The video content is great and very helpful in learning the G1000.

Review.Titre: Multi-Engine Course
Review.Contenu: I have finished the multi-engine course. It is of excellent quality and would recommend it to a friend. However I tried to use my gift card from the CFI referral program. It did not take effect on checkout.

Review.Titre: Bought the private pilot and instrument…
Review.Contenu: Bought the private pilot and instrument package and instant access.Several hours later, still no access or promised email with access code.Yet my credit card has been charged.They were very responsive to my concenrs after the weekend.

Review.Titre: Almost Perfect
Review.Contenu: The website worked great except the auto fill doubled up my address, so I had to edit the address to avoid a shipping error. I would fix that if possible. I would have given you 5 stars if you had a cheaper Postal shipping option. I ordered a $27 cable that could be put in an envelope for likely 4 or 5 dollars shipping. As it is I paid as much for the shipping as the cable. Basically doubling my cost. Note: I haven't received it yet, so I can't check the item quality. Otherwise Stellar. Happy Flying! From Barrie Paintball

Review.Titre: Never received tracking information as…
Review.Contenu: Never received tracking information as promised. The gift was never received by the recipient.Follow up:  Sporty's responded to this post and resent email with gift certificate that was received by the recipient.  Apparently, the email promising tracking information was in error. Thanks, Sportys'

Review.Titre: Small issue's
Review.Contenu: The only think that was slightly annoying is that my business credit card is an American Express and it would not accept an American Express card. I understand why companies do not accept them. It was just frustrating when that is the card I am told to use. Other than than, it was great!

Review.Titre: I've been a Sporty's customer since 1967.
Review.Contenu: I've been a Sporty's customer since I began flying in 1967 and never had any issues with them.  Of the hundreds of orders I've placed with Sportys only once was there an error.  That error was immediately corrected with a simple phone call and proper merchandise promptly shipped.

Review.Titre: The products are great for aviation and…
Review.Contenu: The products are great for aviation and the selection is very large.  The only negative point I see is the shipping charge when purchasing and the fact that the customer has to pay shipping back if returning a product.  In today's online market, that is not a competitive service.

Review.Titre: Great product selection thou some are more expensive
Review.Contenu: Simple UI, great diversity of products and unlike other websites they have those products on hand. They might be on the high side vs other pilot shops but as mentioned if you want something they have it vs having to wait.

Review.Titre: AMEX  on Sportys black list
Review.Contenu: Am disappointed that Sportys will not accept American Express.  I have no problem paying the fee AMEX charges to use their card. I use AMEX as my business charge card.  I have moved Sportys to near the bottom of my supplier list for my business due to their not accepting AMEX.

Review.Titre: Why am I being blasted with emails now
Review.Contenu: Why am I being blasted with emails now?  I paid what you were asking and now your making me pay all over again by filling my inbox with junk mail.  Four emails in the past 5 days, including 2 emails on Wednesday.  Make it stop!  I'm not a criminal!  This is inhumane!

Review.Titre: Very nice information available for the…
Review.Contenu: Very nice information available for the best price FREE! The course is very easy to navigate and the auto save function keeps me from having to remember on my own.

Review.Titre: The supply of items is great and ready…
Review.Contenu: The supply of items is great and ready to send and the prices seem reasonable.The website would not accept my promotional code however so could not take advantage of the promised free ground shipping.

Review.Titre: Login still fails for me 100% on…
Review.Contenu: Login still fails for me 100% on Chrome, it works fine in Edge - literally the only only shop where I have that problem. Other than that, shopping is pretty easy, and Sporty's usally has in stock what I need.

Review.Titre: I love Sporty's
Review.Contenu: I love Sporty's. I tried to order with an updated address and it kept giving me an error. I finally placed the order through a different browser and a different email. Please make your web Sizemore friendly.

Review.Titre: Good as always.
Review.Contenu: Thank you Sporty's for a great website.  It was probably operator error but I ran into difficulty trying to change a billing address in my account during checkout.  Got it squared away and all good now. Looking forward to using the new DC headsets.

Review.Titre: Everything I have ever ordered from…
Review.Contenu: Everything I have ever ordered from Sporty's has always been great, but shipping still is a bit on the pricey side.  Most companies have worked out shipping rates that are much lower or include free shipping.  Just a small irritant.

Review.Titre: Nearly perfect
Review.Contenu: One small issue - I could not track the package going through My Account. Nice response though from my email complaint as they sent me a link that worked. Otherwise all good.

Review.Titre: Payment was not as easy as it should…
Review.Contenu: Payment was not as easy as it should be. I tried AMX then it stalled and said it didn't take it which was fine but I couldn't get out of the current payment. I had to go all the way back and start again, not just put in another card

Review.Titre: Item I wanted was back ordered through…
Review.Contenu: Item I wanted was back ordered through late May.  So I bought the lesser model even though I didn't want to, but needed something now.However, Sporty's is always awesome so I only took 1 star off.

Review.Titre: I’ve just ordered and the process was…shopping experience at Sporty’s
Review.Contenu: I’ve just ordered and the process was easy. I’m waiting to receive my order and use it before I can review it. So far, everything I have ordered from Sporty’s has been on the mark as advertised. I don’t expect any less and I trust this company.

Review.Titre: Close to 5 stars
Review.Contenu: Close to 5 stars. I needed some charts immediately and was going to add half for the next update. But since I would be at a different address by the time for the next update, I had to split (delay) this order and thus  pay 2X shipping  :-(

Review.Titre: Store is fantastic
Review.Contenu: Store is fantastic. Great selection and decent prices. Web site can be a little "wonky" from time time and thus the 4 star instead of 5 star rating. Highly recommend.

Review.Titre: The first rep said she could not ship…
Review.Contenu: The first rep said she could not ship to a PO Box, then Eric got my order shipped. All is well.why did she not know how to do that???I like Sporty's and will be a steady customer and continue to recommend.

Review.Titre: I did not want to continue as a guest…
Review.Contenu: I did not want to continue as a guest when I have an account. Could not remember my password so I ask to reset it. I put in my email and after the sixth time it kept asking I continued as a guest. Never was able to reset my password.

Review.Titre: Chosing the products online was easy…
Review.Contenu: Chosing the products online was easy but during checkout it asked which shipping option I wanted to pay, but there was no option listed for the FREE shipping that I chose.

Review.Titre: I couldn’t figure out how to get a…
Review.Contenu: I couldn’t figure out how to get a certificate for passing BFR quiz. Probably my fault but the procedure could be made more clear.

Review.Titre: Shipping
Review.Contenu: Please put in your shipping just how the package is being shipped. Saves me the question of do I use my PO Box or street address. Appreciate knowing up front- no guessing. Otherwise this was an easy way to order this item!

Review.Titre: Great as always but I did have…
Review.Contenu: Great as always but I did have significant difficulty ordering online while using Firefox browser, I have used this browser in the past without issues. I had to switch to Microsoft Edge browser to complete my order.

Review.Titre: Overall good shopping experience
Review.Contenu: Overall good shopping experience. But, I tried to purchase a subscription to a VFR Sectional Chart along with an hardware item and I could not complete the purchase until I separated the two items.

Review.Titre: Xbox Compatible Yoke
Review.Contenu: I love Sporty's but if you want a yoke or stick that is compatible with Xbox you should look at different sites because Sporty's only has one option for Xbox. Everything else in the store is GREAT tho!

Review.Titre: I was also looking for a couple of…
Review.Contenu: I was also looking for a couple of other items. Alcohol for compass - you don’t carry itA new wall planning map - didn’t like choicesA new knee board - didn’t like choices

Review.Titre: I can get just about anything related…
Review.Contenu: I can get just about anything related to private pilot & flying.  Only a minor negative is no discount for AOPA members like other pilot store does.

Review.Titre: Product presentation was good
Review.Contenu: Product presentation was good. All relevant information shown in a reasonable and expected manner. I had problems with the payment data collection. After three or four attempts, it finally went through.

Review.Titre: There was an issue with the inf I…
Review.Contenu: There was an issue with the inf I submitted for payment. It was resolved the next day after two phone inquires. We chalked it up to the holidays, so we would like to change our response to 5 STARS. Thank you.

Review.Titre: I purchased Patty Wagstaff‘s tutorial…
Review.Contenu: I purchased Patty Wagstaff‘s tutorial on tail dragger‘s. I could not get PayPal to work as the website would only accept a credit card. Other than that, everything went well.

Review.Titre: I am very satisfied with this PJ2 radio. I deducted A half star because I filled out the information to get free shipping and was still charged for shipping.
Review.Contenu: I am very satisfied with the PJ2 radio. I deducted  a half star because I submitted the form for free shipping and was still charged $14.17 for shipping.

Review.Titre: Websites in general are a little…
Review.Contenu: Websites in general are a little confusing and will be until standardization is achieved. Aviation did it, maybe the internet will, too. That's not Sporty's fault, and my only gripe.

Review.Titre: When I typed in "tie downs" I only got…
Review.Contenu: When I typed in "tie downs" I only got a few choices.  Then I typed in "all weather tie downs" and got a lot more choices.  You made it too hard to find what I needed.

Review.Titre: The gift card did not work the first…
Review.Contenu: The gift card did not work the first few times I tried it, but the young lady in customer service worked with me and we got the system to accept the gift card after a few attempts.

Review.Titre: Good Source for Christmas Gifts
Review.Contenu: Good choice of items. "E" gift cards were impossible to use for a telephone order unless you called customer service during the business week but they worked fine when ordering online.

Review.Titre: The purchase process could have been…
Review.Contenu: The purchase process could have been better if Apple Pay was an option. I almost didn’t complete the purchase when I saw PayPal as an option. I don’t trust them …

Review.Titre: Sporty's helped me correct an ordering problem
Review.Contenu: Sporty's found an error in my entry of my credit card and called me directly to help me place the order to get it to my house before Christmas. Excellent customer service.

Review.Titre: Service was really nice & quick
Review.Contenu: Service was really nice & quick. The reason i did not put 5 stars is the online form to fill was difficult to fill and it's not docusign so I have to print & scan.

Review.Titre: Great service hard to come by.
Review.Contenu: everthing went just right and fast thank you. Jim

Review.Titre: Out of Stock and expensive shipping
Review.Contenu: My only reason for the downgrade, is because  they always seem to be out of stock with numerous items placed on extensive back orders. Also shipping's fees are very high.

Review.Titre: wanted to try a method to get more…
Review.Contenu: wanted to try a method to get more precise calculations. I did try to ship to different address other billing and the web site did not allow this change.?

Review.Titre: I received my new Honeycomb Bravo…
Review.Contenu: I received my new Honeycomb Bravo throttle quadrant, but have not been able to use it yet, due to trouble downloading the drivers from Honeycomb.com

Review.Titre: Shipment of products was very slow
Review.Contenu: Shipment of products was very slow, not because of Sporty's, just the product delays because of Covid.  The products, however, are top notch and worth the wait.

Review.Titre: Excess charges
Review.Contenu: I like the idea of a summary program for Rusty Pilots but not happy that I had to pay shipping and handling for something attached to your web site and My Courses

Review.Titre: Practice Test Questions for taking the FAA exam for Drone Pilots
Review.Contenu: I’m taking the FAA test soon so I can fly a drone commercially and needed practice test questions.  This has been a great help.

Review.Titre: Products are good
Review.Contenu: Products are good, ordering easy, but web page lacks functionality and some features do not work as intended.

Review.Titre: Good price for the book but much to…
Review.Contenu: Good price for the book but much to high for shipping.  As a single item of printed material it should be sent as "printed matter".  Much cheaper.

Review.Titre: A great course
Review.Contenu: A great course. I see you’ve doubled the price to submit results to FAA electronically. :-( Guess I can’t complain as the course itself is offered free.

Review.Titre: It looks like things went smoothly
Review.Contenu: It looks like things went smoothly. The only thing that could be improved is where I get access to the course being more obvious.

Review.Titre: Perfect gift for pilots
Review.Contenu: Was searching for small gift for airline pilot and came across this nice selection. Very colorfulOnly  other comment I have is shipping costs are little high

Review.Titre: Easy to follow through shopping…
Review.Contenu: Easy to follow through shopping website. only disappointment is that there is no Free Shipping. Would have given an excellent rating if I got free shipping!

Review.Titre: Very extensive selection of supplies
Review.Contenu: Very extensive selection of supplies, just wish there was better zoom functions so for instance,  you could see the scales on a plotter.

Review.Titre: Love Sporty’s
Review.Contenu: Love the site and brand, would rather shop here than Amazon! Could stand to have a more mobile friendly website. Other than that, love Sporty’s!

Review.Titre: Website Is Easy to Use
Review.Contenu: Website Is Easy to UseThe website is easy to access and view merchandise.  I was surprised at the shipping charge; it seems high for a light-weight item.

Review.Titre: Web site is easy to navigate and use
Review.Contenu: Web site is easy to navigate and use. They almost always have what I need in stock. I'm just surprised they charge shipping on orders over $500.00

Review.Titre: The functionality of the online shop is…
Review.Contenu: The functionality of the online shop is fine. My only complaint is the email newsletter pop ups and the cookies notifications. They get quite annoying

Review.Titre: I wanted to use my American Express…
Review.Contenu: I wanted to use my American Express credit card but Sporty's does not accept AE.  Quite an inconvenience.

Review.Titre: The website is very slow
Review.Contenu: The website is very slow, and there are times when clicking a link it will take 5 or 10 seconds for a response.  Otherwise the experience was fine.

Review.Titre: The only negative is I ordered the…
Review.Contenu: The only negative is I ordered the handheld radio for the Sun and Fun discount and when I got to the checkout it was at full price

Review.Titre: Website a little "glitchy."
Review.Contenu: Overall, the ordering process went OK, but several "glitches" in the website or internet made it necessary to enter my data multiple times.

Review.Titre: Out of stock item.
Review.Contenu: Great selection, easy website to navigate. Only thing was the item I was looking for was out of stock.

Review.Titre: Easy to navigate
Review.Contenu: Easy to navigate and find what I need. I just wish the items with customization options had example images of what they look like.

Review.Titre: Great overall experience. Thanks.
Review.Contenu: Great overall experience. Thanks.The quality of the products were not so good however, and perhaps Sporty's could could do better here.

Review.Titre: What was expected.
Your charges for shipping are…
Review.Contenu: Your charges for shipping are outrageous.  I paid $30 for a part and $10 for shipping.  30% of the purchase price is shipping?

Review.Titre: I was hoping this time of year that…
Review.Contenu: I was hoping this time of year that shipping would be free for the holidays. But it’s been a rough couple of years. And all is good. Thanks

Review.Titre: Further helicopter training
Review.Contenu: It was some what informative but I wish there was more information and training for helicopter pilot please look into this thank you .

Review.Titre: Sporty’s is great
Review.Contenu: Sporty’s is great. I just do not like the fact that it promotes AOPA. I could not care less about AOPA.

Review.Titre: Concise and to the point.
Review.Contenu: Concise and to the point. This is the best ground school online course I’ve tried so far. Highly recommended!

Review.Titre: Saw an email add from Sporty’s
Review.Contenu: Saw an email add. Went online.  Found the product. Bought it and I should get it in a week or less.

Review.Titre: It’s nice to be able to print out your…
Review.Contenu: It’s nice to be able to print out your notes if you have terrible handwriting like myself. I can use the videos and follow along the lesson plan highlighting my printed and legible notes.

Review.Titre: It's a modernized technology which does…
Review.Contenu: It's a modernized technology which does not give the operator hard time to capture videos.Due to improved technology of today,many wants it on funeral services, wedding show and other related functions for future review and remembrance. I therefore ,do hereby take this opportunity to recommend the good job done by our inventor simply because these did well on our grandma's burial

Review.Titre: Great selection with very honest…
Review.Contenu: Great selection with very honest prices. I would much rather give my money to Sporty's than Amazon. The costumer service is also amazing, I mistakenly input the wrong card number and was promptly called the next day. The situation was immediately corrected and the item shipped.

Review.Titre: The online flight review course was well done.
Review.Contenu: The online flight review course was presented very well. Had a few problems getting it started which prompted a call to cust Serv for help. After I was done with the videos and quiz, the process of getting the certificate of completion required another phone call to customer service. Customer Serv was great and handled the issues but it was frustrating to have to make those calls…

Review.Titre: When I ordered my SP-400 NAV/com radio
Review.Contenu: When I ordered my SP-400 NAV/com radio, I forgot to order the headset adapter.I called the Sportys warehouse in Ohio and spoke with a representative there to see if I could add the adapter to the shipment.She was more than helpful and assured me she would personally take care of that since it had only been a few minutes since I had placed my order.I forgot her name, but she was awesome!!Thanks again Sportys for providing general aviation with the great products at reasonable prices that you’ve been doing for years. I’ve always had really good experiences with Sportys!Regards, Adrian Allen

Review.Titre: Sporty's FIRC is excellent!
Review.Contenu: Sporty's FIRC is excellent!  I learned a lot about what's new that I didn't know.  Also, the overall process is easy.  Read the material, review the end of chapter questions a couple times before the test, take the test, fill out IACRA, submit pics of CFI and DL.  Temporary certificate is e-mailed in a day or two.

Review.Titre: Fast delivery, quality product
Review.Contenu: The company delivered our order days before promised. Unlike most, the website was easy to use. The products appear to be high quality, be made of high quality materials. My son loves the design. The products were a hit and we expect to be repeat customers based on what we've seen so far.

Review.Titre: E6B flight computer
Review.Contenu: I ordered the E6B flight computer and glad I did, has been a major help and time saver on studying for multiple functions. Shipping was very fast, recieved in three days even though only selected ground shipping. Very impressed with how efficiently the shipping process was.

Review.Titre: Wonderful experience, HIGHLY RECOMMENDED.
Review.Contenu: Wonderful experience and great course CFI renewal (FARC).  When I sent in the documents, the ID and current CFI didn't show up.  I received a response from Eric within minutes about the missing documents.  Sent documents in JPEG format and received temporary certificate in a very short time.  Excellent catch and coverage.  Thank you Eric and Sporty's.

Review.Titre: Great customer service
Review.Contenu: Great customer service, in a day and age where customer service is lacking in many areas, it is great to have quick and efficient service, I was advised of the mop being out of stock and advised again when it was back in stock.  I would recommend Aero Cosmetics to everyone,  the product is great also. We live in California where we have water restrictions, so washing a motorhome is frowned upon.  But we can use minimal water with your was waterless wash & wax. Great product.

Review.Titre: The online catalog is complete and easy…
Review.Contenu: The online catalog is complete and easy to search. It did help that I knew exactly what to look for (MA-1 flight jacket) but there was no difficulty finding it and then placing the order.Completing the order (on Sporty's end) and getting it out to ship was very quick. Placed order 12/30/22 and it arrived 01/04/23

Review.Titre: Purchased a PJ2 radio and a David Clark…
Review.Contenu: Purchased a PJ2 radio and a David Clark 13.4 headset, both came to Alaska super fast with their 2 day shipping. Quality of the radio feels like a 1,000 dollar handheld great rugged quality. headset is comfortable and fantastic quality. Will buy from again!

Review.Titre: Super fast shipping
Review.Contenu: Super fast shipping, and when the item I bought went on sale a couple days later, they happily extended the discount to me and refunded me some money.  Sporty's is always a great place for pilots to do business.

Review.Titre: Great company to look into
Review.Contenu: Order was processed quickly even with an issue on my end, they quickly called and we were able to rectify the issue. The price is also comparable but I enjoy the web browser or app on the phone for the content.Currently working on the class and it is a great program to get started on, or a nice refresher for people who are use to aircraft operation.

Review.Titre: Purchased a set of David Clark One-X…
Review.Contenu: Purchased a set of David Clark One-X blue tooth headphones at Oshkosh this year and needed the controller belt clip to fit the set. Ordered on Monday afternoon online from Sporty's and had it in my mail box Thursday morning.

Review.Titre: I looked at other online stores for the…
Review.Contenu: I looked at other online stores for the CH Products Fighter Stick and they were either to expensive or there was no communications. I even canceled a order because of the lack of communications. The item was a better price here and fast Thank you and everyone there be safe

Review.Titre: Sporty's has been working at satisfying…
Review.Contenu: Sporty's has been working at satisfying pilot needs since I began flying in the late 1970's. They have it down with great products and service and an honesty that is refreshing. I had questions about a flight simulator we were putting together and their advice was invaluable.

Review.Titre: Quick and easy shopping.
Review.Contenu: I easily navigated the website and found the 2 things I needed fairly quickly. Ordered them over the weekend and received an email Monday morning to notify that they had already shipped! Exceeded expectations!

Review.Titre: Recent headset order
Review.Contenu: I had specific questions about my Headset order. Katie was able to stop shipment on a pair of headsets and I ordered a different brand that was more specifically for my child’s needs. Fantastic customer service all around.

Review.Titre: Fast processing!
Review.Contenu: With IACRA completed on my end in advance,  the paperwork was processed and a temp CFI ticket emailed to me the same day of paying for the filling.  Doesn’t get much better than that.

Review.Titre: Excellent and very user-friendly…
Review.Contenu: Excellent and very user-friendly experience. Very pleased with the overall website and the Private Pilot & IFR Training Video Courses are simply awesome! Highly recommended! Bravo to the Sporty's Pilot Shop! :)

Review.Titre: Great turnaround service
Review.Contenu: Great turnaround service.  My order was filled and delivered in three days.  No hassle during the process.  They also provided updates on the shipment.  Thank goodness they used UPS instead of FEDEX.

Review.Titre: Fantastic service
Review.Contenu: Fantastic service. UPS had an issue with delivering my order and Customer Service was quick to take care of the issue. Simple process and easy. Make sure you create an account before you buy... It makes finding order information a lot easier.

Review.Titre: Excellent
Review.Contenu: I was able to work through the context at my convenience. It was full of useful information. The paperless renewal without a trip to my FSDO is my favorite part, I’m an hour drive away. The cost of the FIRC is hard to beat as well!

Review.Titre: I needed four Bose headsets and…
Review.Contenu: I needed four Bose headsets and Sporty's had them in stock over any other provider. Price was fair and selection, shipping selection and check out was quick and efficient.

Review.Titre: Arrived fast and was the best price
Review.Contenu: Arrived fast and was the best price I could find for the Thrustmaster HOTAS One Flight Simulator Stick. I’m definitely happy with my purchase and the service of Sporty’s Pilot Shop.

Review.Titre: I ordered online during Sun N Fun since…
Review.Contenu: I ordered online during Sun N Fun since the PJ2+ was a "show-price".Quick response and shipping which I have found true every time. Also most helpful on the phone when I was learning about Foreflight.

Review.Titre: Choose Sporty’s if you support GA
Review.Contenu: Sporty’s is fast, responsive, and fairly-priced. Even better, they actually care about General Aviation, unlike retailers who just care about putting everybody else out of business.

Review.Titre: Sporty's is one of the best places I…
Review.Contenu: Sporty's is one of the best places I have ever shopped. Great customer service good prices always let you know what's going on with your products and merchandise

Review.Titre: Everything you need
Review.Contenu: Everything you need. Simple. Easy. Delivers faster than expected. Always has my back. Sporty's is my #1 recommendation for anything aviation!

Review.Titre: Rookie Customer
Review.Contenu: I needed to order a handheld device to be able to listen to my daughter while she flies. I had no clue what make/model to order (I'm not a pilot). I chatted with one of Sporty's customer service reps, and they walked me through everything. He made it so easy to choose what to purchase. The experience was very smooth.

Review.Titre: Amazing shipping speed
Review.Contenu: Amazing shipping speed. Ordered a headset adapter and it arrived two days earlier than expected. Product seems to be of good quality and works well.

Review.Titre: Super fast delivery
Review.Contenu: Super fast delivery. It was exactly what I was looking for. This poster is helping visualize start up procedures. It's saving me money.

Review.Titre: Outstanding cloth A2 Jacket
Review.Contenu: Outstanding cloth A2 Jacket. The sizing runs high, as I ordered an XL which was way too large. The Large is a bit snug but will work out fine. Very well made to include stitching, Leather Collar, and lining. Very comfortable and at a great price !

Review.Titre: They fixed their mistake
Review.Contenu: My order was shipped to my billing address instead of my shipping address. When calling customer service I was told that sportys would reimburse my the shipping cost but that it would be my responsibility to fix their mistake and arrange to have my products shipped to the correct address. They did offer to reimburse me for that expense. Just to much trouble. It will be at least three months before I even see my order. I have always had good service from Sportys in the passed. I am disappointed this time.After having a conversation with Sporty’ customer service manager the problem was resolved and I will receive a replacement order sent to the correct address. This is the right thing to do to fix their mistake. Thank you Sporty’s. Now I would like to change my grading of you to five stars and will continue to do business with you. Mistakes will happen but we must fix them ourselves and not pass on the problems they create to someone else to fix

Review.Titre: Sporty’s is market leading aviation…
Review.Contenu: Sporty’s is market leading aviation stuff vendor in my mind. Their positive reputation has built from their great service.
